name.baseName: High efficiency cypermethrin ; Methyl benzoate, tert-butanol, chlorinated sulfoxide ; Condensation ; All sizes; NESPS2
高效氯氟氰菊酯 ; 贲亭酸甲酯、叔丁醇、氯化亚砜 ; 缩合 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该化学工艺描述了与甲酸甲酯、叔丁醇和氯化亚砜的高效缩合作用的氯氟氰菊酯，适用于所有规模的生产。末端治理技术适用于废水处理和化学需氧量、氨氮、有机态氮、氰化物、废气和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的污染控制。这些技术包括多种组合，如次氯酸钠降解氰化物、成型厌氧反应器、A/O工艺、生物膜工艺、生物滤池、化学混凝、氧化还原工艺、吸附技术、蒸汽和氮/空气脱附，以及再生热氧化（RTO），各自有其效率评级。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,三级代码263.0文件，在完整版文件中第2936页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundis(2500 others) Sodium hypochlorite breaking cyanide + shaped anaerobic reactor + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是（2500其他）次氯酸钠破氰+定型厌氧反应器类+A/O工艺，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisBiofilm process + A/O process + biological filter + chemical coagulation method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是生物膜法+A/O工艺+生物滤池+化学混凝法，其效率为88，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRTO，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.9
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是RTO，其效率为99.9，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisBiofilm process + A/O process + biological filter + chemical coagulation method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是生物膜法+A/O工艺+生物滤池+化学混凝法，其效率为98，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
nan
源文件中描述为为高效氯氟氰菊酯，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia Nitrogenis(2500 others) Sodium hypochlorite breaking cyanide + shaped anaerobic reactor + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management72
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是（2500其他）次氯酸钠破氰+定型厌氧反应器类+A/O工艺，其效率为72，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundis(Adsorption + steam desorption)/(adsorption + nitrogen/air desorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是（吸附+蒸汽解析）/（吸附+氮气/空气解析），其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideis(2500 others) Sodium hypochlorite breaking cyanide + shaped anaerobic reactor + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是（2500其他）次氯酸钠破氰+定型厌氧反应器类+A/O工艺，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisBiofilm process + A/O process + biological filter + chemical coagulation method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是生物膜法+A/O工艺+生物滤池+化学混凝法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRedox process + (absorption + diversion)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是氧化还原法+（吸收+分流），其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of equipment (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisBiofilm process + A/O process + biological filter + chemical coagulation method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.4，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = total amount of pollutants actually treated by the treatment facility (kg) / total amount of pollutants that should be treated (kg)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是生物膜法+A/O工艺+生物滤池+化学混凝法，其效率为99.4，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis(2500 others) Sodium hypochlorite breaking cyanide + shaped anaerobic reactor + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = total amount of pollutants actually treated by the treatment facility (kg) / total amount of pollutants that should be treated (kg)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是（2500其他）次氯酸钠破氰+定型厌氧反应器类+A/O工艺，其效率为89，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of the treatment facilities (kWh) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
